text.name: InvalidFormMessage
text.value: Your form is invalid. Please check and correct it.

text.name: ThereIsNoTenantDefinedWithName{0}
text.value: There is no tenant defined with name {0}

text.name: UserIsNotActiveAndCanNotLogin
text.value: User {0} is not active and can not log in.

text.name: RoleDeleteWarningMessage
text.value: Role {0} will be deleted and unassigned from all assigned users.

text.name: ResetPermissionsTooltip
text.value: This button immediately resets user specific permission settings and saves changes. The user will only have permissions from assigned roles.

text.name: ThisWebSiteRootAddress_Hint
text.value: It will be used when building links to this web site. It's needed for some tasks like building password reset links. Ex: http://mydomain.com/

text.name: SendPasswordResetLink_Information
text.value: A password reset link will be sent to your email to reset your password. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.

text.name: InvalidUserNameOrEmailAddress
text.value: Invalid user name or email address

text.name: PasswordResetEmail_SubTitle
text.value: This email is sent you to reset and re-create your password.

text.name: PasswordResetEmail_ClickTheLinkBelowToResetYourPassword
text.value: Please click the link below to reset your password:

text.name: EmailActivation_SubTitle
text.value: This email is sent you to verify your email.

text.name: EmailActivation_ClickTheLinkBelowToVerifyYourEmail
text.value: Please click the link below to verify your email address:

text.name: InvalidPasswordResetCode_Detail
text.value: Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this not solves the problem, you can re-try to request a new password reset link.

text.name: UserEmailIsNotConfirmedAndCanNotLogin
text.value: Your email address is not confirmed. Please check your email and click the email confirmation link to activate your account. If you did not receive activation email, click the 'email confirmation' to request a new email.

text.name: InvalidEmailConfirmationCode_Detail
text.value: Please be sure you entered this page by clicking the link sent to your email. If this not solves the problem, you can re-try to request a new confirmation code.

text.name: YourEmailIsConfirmedMessage
text.value: Your email address is successfully confirmed.

text.name: ShouldChangePasswordOnNextLogin
text.value: Should Change Password On Next Login.

text.name: SendEmailActivationLink_Information
text.value: A link will be sent to your email to activate your email address. If you don't get an email within a few minutes, please re-try.

text.name: SelfUserRegistrationIsDisabledMessage
text.value: You can not register to the system!

text.name: SelfUserRegistrationIsDisabledMessage_Detail
text.value: Self user registration is disabled. Please contact to the system administrator to register.

text.name: ConfirmationMailSentPleaseClickLinkInTheEmail
text.value: A confirmation mail sent to {0}. Please click link in the email in order to confirm your mail address.

text.name: YourAccountIsWaitingToBeActivatedByAdmin
text.value: Your account is waiting to be activated by system admin.

text.name: AllowUsersToRegisterThemselves
text.value: Allow users to register to the system.

text.name: AllowUsersToRegisterThemselves_Hint
text.value: If you disable this, users will only be added by admin using user management page.

text.name: NewRegisteredUsersIsActiveByDefault
text.value: New registered users are active by default.

text.name: NewRegisteredUsersIsActiveByDefault_Hint
text.value: If you disable this, new users will not be active (and can not login) until admin manually activate the account.

text.name: DefaultRole_Description
text.value: Assign to new users as default.

text.name: StaticRole_Tooltip
text.value: Static roles can not be deleted.

text.name: TenantNameCanNotBeEmpty
text.value: Tenant name can not be empty

text.name: TenantName_Regex_Description
text.value: Tenant name must be at least 2 chars, starts with a letter and continue with letter, number, dash or underscore.

text.name: ProfilePicture_Change_Info
text.value: You can select a JPG/JPEG/PNG file with a maximum 1MB size.

text.name: ProfilePicture_Change_Error
text.value: Your profile picture could not be changed.

text.name: ProfilePicture_Warn_SizeLimit
text.value: Picture size must be smaller than 1MB. Please select another file.

text.name: ProfilePicture_Warn_FileType
text.value: You can only select JPG/JPEG/PNG file. Please select another file.

text.name: Captha_Hint
text.value: Please enter the security code shown in the picture below:

text.name: CaptchaCanNotBeEmpty
text.value: Security code can not be empty.

text.name: FormIsNotValidMessage
text.value: Form is not valid. Please check and fix errors.

text.name: CanNotChangeAdminUserName
text.value: Can not change username of the admin.

text.name: WeCanNotFindThePage
text.value: We can not find the page you're looking for.

text.name: DashboardDemo_Note_Title
text.value: Welcome to ASP.NET Zero startup project!

texts.text: In this demo, you can use the left menu to test fully functional pages. This dashboard page is just for demonstration purposes, texts and datas are meaningless. Almost all datas are hard-coded in the client side, except the small MEMBER ACTIVITY graphs. When you click the REFRESH button, graph data is requested from server and server generates random data.

text.name: WelcomePage_Info
text.value: Welcome to the application. You can use the menu to start using the application. If you don't see any menu item, probably you don't have permission to see any page. Consider to ask system administration for permissions.

text.name: PasswordResetMailSentMessage
text.value: A password reset link sent to your e-mail address. Please check your emails.

text.name: ActivationMailSentMessage
text.value: An e-mail activation link sent to your e-mail address. Please check your emails.

text.name: UseCaptchaOnRegistration
text.value: Use security image question (captcha) on registration.

text.name: TenantSelection_Detail
text.value: Please select one of the following tenants.

text.name: PasswordChangeDontRememberMessage
text.value: If you can not remember your password, {0}

texts.text: See Demo for Multi-Page Application version with ASP.NET MVC and jQuery.
Notice: There is also a Single-Page Application version built using ASP.NET MVC and AngularJs.

text.name: EditionsHeaderInfo
text.value: Manage editions and features of the application

text.name: EditionDeleteWarningMessage
text.value: {0} will be deleted and unassigned from all assigned tenants.

text.name: ResetFeaturesTooltip
text.value: This button immediately resets tenant specific feature settings and saves changes. The tenant will only have features from assigned edition.

text.name: InvalidFeaturesWarning
text.value: One or more feature values are not valid!

text.name: LanguageDeleteWarningMessage
text.value: Are you sure to delete the language {0}?

text.name: CanNotEditOrDeleteDefaultLanguages
text.value: Can not edit or delete default languages. You can only edit or delete the languages you added. But you can change texts of all languages.

text.name: OrganizationUnitsHeaderInfo
text.value: Use tenant groups to organize users and entities

text.name: SelectAnOrganizationUnitToSeeMembers
text.value: Select an organization unit to see members.

text.name: OrganizationUnitDeleteWarningMessage
text.value: Are you sure to delete organization unit {0}?

text.name: RemoveUserFromOuWarningMessage
text.value: Are you sure to remove user {0} from organization unit {1}?

text.name: UserIsAlreadyInTheOrganizationUnit
text.value: This user is already in the organization unit!

text.name: OrganizationUnitMoveConfirmMessage
text.value: Please confirm to move {0} to under {1}.

text.name: AuditLogImpersonatedOperationInfo
text.value: Note: This operation is performed by another user on behalf of this user.

text.name: YouCanBackToYourAccount
text.value: You can back to your account here.

text.name: CascadeImpersonationErrorMessage
text.value: Can not make cascade impersonation. This is already an impersonated login!

text.name: FromTenantToHostImpersonationErrorMessage
text.value: Can not impersonate a host user from a tenant user!

text.name: DifferentTenantImpersonationErrorMessage
text.value: Can not impersonate a user of a different tenant!

text.name: ImpersonationTokenErrorMessage
text.value: Impersonation token is invalid or expired!

text.name: NotImpersonatedLoginErrorMessage
text.value: This is not an impersonated login!

texts.text: You can not link to same account!
You must change your password before linking this account!
Link to user {0} will be deleted.

text.name: SwitchToLinkedAccountTokenErrorMessage
text.value: Impersonation token is invalid or expired!

text.name: WelcomeToTheApplicationNotificationMessage
text.value: Welcome to CORPACCOUNTING! Notification system is used to inform you for intended events. You can select which type of notifications you want to receive from the notification settings.

text.name: NewUserRegisteredNotificationDefinition
text.value: On a new user registered to the application.

text.name: NewUserRegisteredNotificationMessage
text.value: A new user registered to the application. User name: {userName}, Email address: {emailAddress}.

text.name: ReceiveNotifications_Definition
text.value: This option can be used to completely enable/disable receiving notifications.

text.name: ReceiveNotifications_DisableInfo
text.value: You completely disabled receiving notifications. You can enabled it and select notification types you want to receive.

text.name: YouCanNotDeleteOwnAccount
text.value: You can not delete own user account!

texts.text: You can clear caches in application on this page.
You can see latest logs in this page or download all logs in a single zip file.

text.name: AllowTenantsToRegisterThemselves
text.value: Allow Tenants to register to the system.

text.name: AllowTenantsToRegisterThemselves_Hint
text.value: If you disable this, Tenants will only be added by Admin using Tenant Management page.

text.name: NewRegisteredTenantsIsActiveByDefault
text.value: New registered tenants are active by default.

text.name: NewRegisteredTenantsIsActiveByDefault_Hint
text.value: If you disable this, new tenants will not be active (and can not login) until admin manually activate the account.

text.name: NewTenantRegisteredNotificationDefinition
text.value: On a new tenant registered to the application.

text.name: NewTenantRegisteredNotificationMessage
text.value: A new tenant registered to the application. Tenancy name: {tenancyName}.

text.name: ResizedProfilePicture_Warn_SizeLimit
text.value: Resized picture size must be smalled than 100KB. Please resize down and try again.

texts.text: Please do not enter an email address for username.

text.name: TenantDatabaseConnectionStringChangeWarningMessage
text.value: Notice: Before changing the database connection string for a tenant, you should move the tenant database to the new location. Changing connection string does not move the tenant database.

texts.text: Timezone setting changed. Click OK button to refresh page and changes to take effect.

text.name: Template_FileType_Warn
text.value: You can select only .xls/.xlsx file. Please select another file.
